FuncDef: The display pim invalid-packet verbose command displays statistics about received invalid PIM messages and details of these messages.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays details about a specified number of latest received invalid PIM messages.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 100. By default, the command displays details about all received invalid PIM messages.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If packet-number and verbose are specified, the command displays details about the specified number of latest received invalid PIM messages.
